tog noun
(UNIT)

Sportswear & swimwear
be/get yourself togged up/out
UK to dress yourself in clothes that are specially for a particular occasion or activity: We got (ourselves) togged up in walking gear for the hike. They were all togged out in dinner jackets and ballgowns. Synonyms
